statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" --no-optional-locks symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); git_info=" on  $branch"; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[36m$dir_name\033[0m$git_info \033[35m[$model]\033[0m"
